metadata.title: CVE-2024-35796 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: ll_temac: platform_get_resource replaced by wrong functionThe function platform_get_resource was replaced withdevm_platform_ioremap_resource_byname and is called using 0 as name.This eventually ends up in platform_get_resource_byname in the callstack, where it causes a null pointer in strcmp.	if (type == resource_type(r) && !strcmp(r->name, name))It should have been replaced with devm_platform_ioremap_resource.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
